events.name: Lithium-Iron Phosphate Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: The lithium iron phosphate battery recycling process includes pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, and bioleaching methods.
events.description: The lithium iron phosphate battery recycling process includes pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, and bioleaching methods.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Specialized solution reagents are used to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Specialized solution reagents are used to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Slower capacity loss
events.wd_description: LFP batteries experience a slower rate of capacity loss compared to other lithium-ion chemistries.
events.description: LFP batteries experience a slower rate of capacity loss compared to other lithium-ion chemistries.

events.name: Capacity loss data
events.wd_description: Research indicates that LFP batteries experience a slower rate of capacity loss over time.
events.description: Research indicates that LFP batteries experience a slower rate of capacity loss over time.
